word:
(2) Two months later she wrote: "Redlands and Riverside have been presented to me as places that should be worked. These two places should not longer be neglected. I hope soon to see an earnest effort put forth in their behalf. Will you please consider the advisability of establishing a sanitarium 


                             -2- 

in the vicinity of these towns, with treatment rooms in each place, to act as feeders to the institution?"
